title: mushroom sprout polenta
ingredients: 1/2 large onion (or 3/4 small), thinly sliced (preferably red or sweet yellow)
instructions: Trim and slice mushrooms in half. Toss in olive oil, salt, pepper, and minced garlic directly on a baking sheet (should just fit into a 1/4 baking sheet).
Bring water to a boil and add polenta. Reduce to a low simmer and cook for 15 minutes, stirring often.
Add 4 Tbsp butter and Parmesan, then season to taste with salt.
Meanwhile, cook the Brussels sprouts and onion in 2 Tbsp butter until deeply browned. Season to taste.
To serve, spread polenta onto a plate, tapping it to fill the bottom like risotto.
Top with a nest of Brussels sprouts and 5–10 mushroom halves.
